an6.22:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you these six qualities that prevent decline. …
an6.22:1.2: And what, mendicants, are the six qualities that prevent decline?
an6.22:1.3: Not relishing work, talk, sleep, and company, being easy to admonish, and having good friends.
an6.22:2.1: Whether in the past, future, or present, all those who have not declined in skillful qualities do so because of these six qualities.”
